meanings.definition: The quality or state of being allergenic.
meanings.sent1: The allergenicities of certain foods can trigger allergies in some people.
meanings.sent2: Doctors test for allergenicities to determine what substances may cause allergic reactions.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the allergenicities of the dish were so high, it could make anyone sneeze.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume had such strong allergenicities that it made everyone in the room start itching.
meanings.sent5: The allergenicities of pollen in the air were so intense that even the birds seemed to be sneezing.

meanings.definition: The ability to cause an allergic reaction.
meanings.sent1: Some people have higher allergenicities to pet dander than others.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the allergenicities of different substances can help prevent allergic reactions.
meanings.sent3: The cat's mischievous plan was to use its allergenicities to make everyone in the house sneeze.
meanings.sent4: The allergenicities of the new detergent were so strong that it caused a rash on sensitive skin.
meanings.sent5: The allergenicities of the flowers in the garden were so potent that even the bees avoided them.
